thread.title: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is pregnant | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is pregnant | Daily Mail Online

author: Jason Chester For Mailonline
title: Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is pregnant | Daily Mail Online
text: ‘So she thought she might have missed her chance to have any more kids.’ MailOnline has contacted Danielle's representatives for further comment. Moving on: Los Angeles based Danielle, 37, is said to be ecstatic with the news, which comes little more than a year after the Welsh model and actress announced her separation from Match of the day host Lineker The Welsh star, already a parent to 14-year old daughter Ella from a former relationship, is said to have met Ivy League educated entertainment lawyer Nate eight months ago after moving to California to further her ambitions as an actress. He originally hails from Pennsylvania and works for CAA, a Los Angeles-based talent agency. Former Tottenham Hotspur and England footballer Gary, 55, is said to be fully supportive of their blossoming romance and 'couldn't be more pleased' for them, MailOnline has learned. My girl: Danielle is already a parent to daughter Ella from a former relationship 'Danielle and Nate are very happy and planning a future together, a friend told MailOnline. 'Gary and Nate got on very well when they met and Gary couldn’t be more pleased for them both.' Danielle and Gary divorced in January after six years of marriage and have remained on amicable terms. They wed in Ravello, Italy, in 2009 after dating for two years. The former couple, believed to be worth around £20million, are said to have spent just £400 on the divorce, filling out the online forms together earlier this yearto get a Decree Nisi at Southampton County Court. Proud dad: Alongside George, Tobias and Angus (pictured), Gary has another son Harry with his ex-wife Michelle Cockayne, from whom he split in 2006 after a 20-year marriage Speaking to The Daily Telegraph in 2016, Gary spoke openly about the couple's shock break-up, explaining that it was incredibly tough to go through a divorce in the public eye. 'Obviously when you know you are going through something personal that you know is going to become public, it makes it quite difficult, and it becomes a weight on your shoulders,' he told the newspaper. Alongside George, Tobias and Angus, Gary has another son Harry with his ex-wife Michelle Cockayne, from whom he split in 2006 after a 20-year marriage.
